text: Twisters is a 2024 American disaster movie directed by Lee Isaac Chung. It is based on a story by Joseph Kosinski. It is a standalone sequel to Twister (1996). The movie stars Daisy Edgar-Jones, Glen Powell, Anthony Ramos,Choya Partridge, Brandon Perea, Maura Tierney, and Sasha Lane. Twisters was released internationally by Warner Bros. Pictures on July 10, 2024 and in the United States by Universal Pictures on July 19. The movie received generally positive reviews from critics. ==References== Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:DreamWorks Pictures movies Category:2024 movies Category:American disaster movies Category:Movies set in Oklahoma Category:Movies set on farms Category:American sequel movies Category:Movies composed by Benjamin Wallfisch
title: Twisters (movie)
